metadata.title: CVE-2023-52769 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: ath12k: fix htt mlo-offset event lockingThe ath12k active pdevs are protected by RCU but the htt mlo-offsetevent handling code calling ath12k_mac_get_ar_by_pdev_id() was notmarked as a read-side critical section.Mark the code in question as an RCU read-side critical section to avoidany potential use-after-free issues.Compile tested only.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
